/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. A few trees interspersed among the buildings add a touch of green to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of life and activity, characteristic of a busy city street.
